reference.title: Subject definition topic
reference.shortdesc: You create a subject topic by providing a formal definition for a concept.

section.title: Description
section.p: The formal definition consists of a section that specifies the labels and icons for representing the subject and the notes defining the subject coverage or recording its modification.

example.title: Example
example.p: Here is an example of a definition of the Configuring subject:
example.codeblock:
Configuring You configure components to set up or refine your solution.

You don't have to get the best configuration the first time....

Setting up Administrative actions performed after installation...
